title: Oracle Data with Pyth Network
description: Explore Pyth Network on Aptos, a first-party oracle that delivers accurate and real-time market data for cryptocurrencies, equities, and other financial products to the Aptos blockchain.

tasks.title: Prepare for Oracle Exploration
tasks.description: Add at least 0.05 APT to your wallet to begin exploring Pyth Network

tasks.title: Oracles Basics
tasks.question: What is the main purpose of a blockchain oracle like Pyth Network?
options: To validate transactions on the blockchain
To provide external real-world data to blockchains
To store large amounts of data off-chain
tasks.correctAnswer: To provide external real-world data to blockchains

tasks.title: Pyth Network Overview
tasks.description: Learn what makes Pyth Network unique
tasks.question: What type of data does Pyth Network primarily provide to Aptos?
options: Price feeds for various financial assets
tasks.correctAnswer: Price feeds for various financial assets

tasks.title: Data Sources
tasks.description: Understanding where Pyth gets its data
tasks.question: Where does Pyth Network source its price data from?
options: From over 70 first-party data providers including exchanges, market makers, and trading firms
tasks.correctAnswer: From over 70 first-party data providers including exchanges, market makers, and trading firms

tasks.title: Price Feed Updates
tasks.description: Learn how frequently Pyth data updates
tasks.question: How often are Pyth price feeds typically updated?

tasks.title: Pyth on Aptos
tasks.description: Understanding how Pyth is implemented on Aptos
tasks.question: How is Pyth Network integrated with Aptos?
options: Using Move modules that receive price updates from Pyth's cross-chain infrastructure
Through manual updates by the Pyth team
It isn't directly integrated with Aptos
tasks.correctAnswer: Using Move modules that receive price updates from Pyth's cross-chain infrastructure

tasks.title: DeFi Applications
tasks.description: Learn how Pyth is used in Aptos DeFi
tasks.question: Which of these Aptos DeFi applications might use Pyth Network price feeds?
options: Lending protocols, DEXes, and derivatives platforms
tasks.correctAnswer: Lending protocols, DEXes, and derivatives platforms

tasks.title: Price Feed Security
tasks.question: How does Pyth Network improve the security of its price feeds?
options: By using a single trusted data source
Through aggregation of multiple independent data sources and confidence intervals
By updating very infrequently to avoid mistakes
By manually reviewing each price before publishing
tasks.correctAnswer: Through aggregation of multiple independent data sources and confidence intervals

tasks.title: Confidence Intervals
tasks.description: Learn about Pyth's unique confidence metric
tasks.question: What is the confidence interval in Pyth price feeds?
options: A measure of uncertainty in the price indicating potential price ranges
The number of sources confirming the price
tasks.correctAnswer: A measure of uncertainty in the price indicating potential price ranges

tasks.title: Price Feed Types
tasks.question: What types of assets can have price feeds on Pyth Network?
options: Cryptocurrencies, forex, equities, commodities, and more
tasks.correctAnswer: Cryptocurrencies, forex, equities, commodities, and more
